zh.Home.index.010851-2: 不同的设备因为通信协议的不同，存在接入步骤的差异
zh.Home.index.010851-7: 根据视频设备的传输协议，在已创建的产品下添加对应的设备。
zh.Home.index.010851-9: 查看设备下的通道数据，可以进行直播、录制等操作。
zh.Home.index.010851-10: 暂无权限，请联系管理员

en.Home.index.010851-2: Different devices have different access steps due to differences in communication protocols
en.Home.index.010851-7: According to the transmission protocol of the video device, add the corresponding device under the created product.
en.Home.index.010851-9: Viewing channel data under the device allows for live streaming, recording, and other operations.
en.Home.index.010851-10: No permission at the moment, please contact the administrator
en.Home.index.010851-11: Display video stream data from multiple channels in split screens.
